markdown:
**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156))
 **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You shoot an arrow at an open space on a surface within 500 feet and momentarily vanish into a wind that carries the arrow. You teleport to that location.
name: Interact (conjuration, teleportation)
